name: Pizza Truck Simulator
description:
Are you tired of playing pizza truck simulations that feel so far from the real thing? Check out the latest game from @cosmoddd and @charlietran! Pizza Truck Simulator has been painstakingly recreated from our own experiences with pizza and trucks for the 2017 Game Off

Credits
  • Charlie Tran - Game Design, Programming
  • Cosmo D - Music, Modeling, Animation, Add'l Programming
  • Chad Pugh - Logo and intro art

Mouse left click icon by Benjamin Sommerlad (CC BY 3.0)
